title: Taking What He Wants
description: Chase Thornton is out for blood when he learns of his fianc√©'s hidden agenda. Filled with rage and the pent up sexual energy that seems to peak only when in the presence of his innocent soon to be ex sister in law, Chase sets his sights on a new mission. To destroy the wayward Celine, and enrapture her younger sister Delia in this tale of family intrigue and revenge where one man's thirst for vengeance just might lead him down the road to his salvation.
author: Jordan Silver
